thread.title: Woodbridge man hits $4.3 million jackpot while playing lottery game
thread.title_full: Woodbridge man hits $4.3 million jackpot while playing lottery game

author: Odyssey Fields
title: Woodbridge man hits $4.3 million jackpot while playing lottery game
text:
DC News Now Washington Woodbridge man hits $4.3 million jackpot while playing lottery game Odyssey Fields Thu, January 23, 2025 at 7:57 PM UTC 1 min read
WOODBRIDGE, Va. ( DC News Now ) — One man turned his boredom into a lucky win after striking the jackpot while playing a Virginia Lottery game.
Manoj Chhetry told lottery officials that he was sitting at home when he went online to play a few games.
Once he was finished, he noticed that he had won a jackpot worth $4,303,499 in the Merry Money Mania game.
“I didn’t know what happened!” Chhetry later told Lottery officials.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Metro celebrates pandas’ return with special SmarTrip cards
At first, the Woodbridge man thought it was a scam. That’s when he called his wife to look at the screen to confirm the total.
According to the Virginia Lottery, Merry Money Mania is one of many instant games that are available on the lottery app and online.
As more people play, the jackpot for the game continues to grow.
Officials said the odds per game of winning a prize are 1 in 3.74.
